gstEncodersToTransform

int gstEncodersToTransform( int id , long encoders [ ] , gstTransformMatrix& mat ) ;

Performs Phantom kinematics to convert encoder values to a stylus transform. This does not affect the phantom's intenral picture of itself - if you've changed the encodrs so that you get a different answer, you may get weird results.

Declared in header file: gstDeviceIO.h
